document_data.name: Earthdigger
document_data.mainbody: '''Earthdigger''' was a [[wizard]] member of the [[Flaming Fist]] who served the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Fist Earthdigger was a fair-skinned [[human]] man with blue eyes, mousy-blonde facial hair, and disheveled haircut. He wore a dark red [[robe]] of a Flaming Fist mage and was armed with a [[quarterstaff]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Fist Earthdigger was stationed in the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of Baldur's Gate, within the [[Wyrm's Crossing]] fortress. During he [[Absolute crisis]], Earthdigger, along with other Fists guarded the new [[Grand Duke]] [[Enver Gortash]], unbeknownst to all â€“ one of the men behind the [[Cult of the Absolute]] and the strife that befell Baldur's Gate.
